theme.name: Extra items in Category menu line

theme_fields.name: body_tag
theme_fields.value:
<script>

  Discourse.ExternalNavItem = Discourse.NavItem.extend({
    href : function() {
      return this.get('href');
    }.property('href')
  });

  I18n.translations.en.js.filters.item1 = { title: "Item 1", help: "Tooltip 1" };
  I18n.translations.en.js.filters.item2 = { title: "Item 2", help: "Tooltip 2" }

  Discourse.NavItem.reopenClass({
    buildList : function(category, args) {
      var list = this._super(category, args);
      if(!category) {
        list.push(Discourse.ExternalNavItem.create({href: '/internal', name: 'item1'}));
        list.push(Discourse.ExternalNavItem.create({href: 'https://www.discoursehosting.com/', name: 'item2'}));
      }
      return list;
    }
  });

 </script>

theme_fields.name: scss
theme_fields.value:
/* Select the </body> tab and change the item names and tooltip titles in lines 9-10 
   Change the URLs in lines 16-17

   If your forum uses another locale, change the .en. in lines 9-10 to your locale code as well.
   
*/
